Uses of Package
br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

  • Packages that use br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model 
    Package Description
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles
    The core classes of the application, such as the desktop starter, the controller and the player profile.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data
    The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model
    The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies
    A package with the enemy logic of each match.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d
    This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens
    The visual layer (interfaces).
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts
    The scripts are classes which specify the behavior of cards in battles.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles 
    Class and Description
    BattlePlatform
    A BattlePlatform object storages all the information regarding a battle: the players' decks, the map and the cards placed on it, the rules being applied etc.
    Card
    Template for the behavior of the cards on the field.
    Fighter
    A representation of a fighter card on the field.
    Profile
    A class representing the player's data.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data 
    Class and Description
    Deck
    Basically, an serializable array of cards, with some extra functions, an image, a name.
    Effect
    A representation of an effect card on the field.
    Fighter
    A representation of a fighter card on the field.
    Profile
    A class representing the player's data.
    Scene
    A Scene is an object which represents a narrative sequence within the story.
    Trap
    A representation of an trap card on the field.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model 
    Class and Description
    Battle 
    BattlePlatform
    A BattlePlatform object storages all the information regarding a battle: the players' decks, the map and the cards placed on it, the rules being applied etc.
    Card
    Template for the behavior of the cards on the field.
    Deck
    Basically, an serializable array of cards, with some extra functions, an image, a name.
    DefaultRules
    Basic set of rules for any match, including the rules/logic for determining victory or defeat.
    Field
    This class may represent the player or enemy field.
    Map
    A Map object is a three-dimensional Array containing the cards placed on the field.
    Player 
    Profile
    A class representing the player's data.
    Scene
    A Scene is an object which represents a narrative sequence within the story.
